Module RRT¶

Abstract RRT class with all functions for the different RRT sub-types.

class rrt.RRT(simulation_param, rrt_param, lead_vehicle_param)[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

property a_max¶
Return type

float

property a_min¶
Return type

float

braking(closest_node, acc_state, lead_vehicle_param, acc_vehicle_param, simulation_param)[source]¶

Braking with minimal acceleration until standstill for a single node which violates safe distance

Parameters

  • closest_node (Node) – node which violates safe distance at time step t-1

  • acc_state (State) – corresponding ACC states at time step t

  • lead_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the lead vehicle

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the ACC vehicle

  • simulation_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with parameters of the simulation environment

Return type

Node

Returns

single node at time step t

static dereference_unused_nodes(node_list, new_node_list)[source]¶

Delete all nodes from time step t-1 which are childless

Parameters

  • node_list (List[Node]) – list of nodes from time step t-1

  • new_node_list (List[Node]) – list of nodes from time step t

property dt¶
Return type

float

forward_simulation(steering_velocity, acceleration, closest_node, acc_state, lead_vehicle_param, acc_vehicle_param, simulation_param)[source]¶

Forward simulation of a node

Parameters

  • steering_velocity (float) – input steering velocity [rad/s]

  • acceleration (float) – input acceleration [m/s^2]

  • closest_node (Node) – node which violates safe distance at time step t-1

  • acc_state (State) – corresponding ACC states at time step t

  • lead_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the lead vehicle

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with physical parameters of the ACC vehicle

  • simulation_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – dictionary with parameters of the simulation environment

Return type

Node

Returns

single node at time step t

get_input_global(s_desired, v_desired, closest_node, acc_state)[source]¶

Calculates the input to get to the sampled state for the global references sampling strategy

Parameters

  • s_desired (float) – sampled position for the leading vehicle [m]

  • v_desired (float) – sampled velocity for the leading vehicle [m/s]

  • closest_node (Node) – nearest node to sampled state

  • acc_state (State) – ACC state at time step t - not used for input calculation (not needed for global

coordinate system) :rtype: float :return: input acceleration

get_input_local(delta_s_desired, delta_v_desired, closest_node, acc_state)[source]¶

Calculates the input to get to the sampled state for the coordinate system

Parameters

  • delta_s_desired (float) – sampled x-position for the leading vehicle [m]

  • delta_v_desired (float) – sampled velocity for the leading vehicle [m/s]

  • closest_node (Node) – nearest node to sampled state

  • acc_state (State) – ACC state at time step t

Return type

float

Returns

input acceleration

static nearest_node_global(node_list, sample)[source]¶

Euclidean distance to choose the closest node for the global coordinate system

Parameters

  • node_list (List[Node]) – list of nodes from previous time step

  • sample (List[float]) – list with sampled x-position [m], sampled velocity [m/s]

Return type

Tuple[Node, int]

Returns

parent node, node index in node_list

static nearest_node_local(node_list, sample)[source]¶

Closest node based on Euclidean distance for local coordinate system

Parameters

  • node_list (List[Node]) – list of nodes from previous time step

  • sample (List[float]) – list with sampled distance [m], sampled velocity difference [m/s]

Return type

Tuple[Node, int]

Returns

parent node, node index in node_list

static normalize_state(list_s, list_v, sample)[source]¶

Creates normalized states for global (local) coordinate system

Parameters

  • list_s (List[float]) – list of absolute position (difference) values from all node at t-1 [m]

  • list_v (List[float]) – list of absolute velocity (difference) values from all node at t-1 [m]

  • sample (List[float]) – list containing the sampled x-position (distance) and velocity (difference)

Return type

Tuple[float, float, float, float, float, float]

Returns

mean position (difference) , mean velocity (difference) , position (difference) variance,

velocity (difference) variance, normalized position (difference) , normalized velocity (difference)

property number_nodes_rrt¶
Return type

int

abstract plan(node_list, acc_state_list, lead_vehicle_param, acc_vehicle_param, simulation_param)[source]¶

Planning function for single lane scenario

Parameters

  • node_list (List[Node]) – list of rrt-nodes from time step t-1

  • acc_state_list (List[State]) – list with all acc states from time step t

  • lead_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – physical parameters of the vehicle

  • acc_vehicle_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – physical parameters of the ACC vehicle

  • simulation_param (Dict[~KT, ~VT]) – parameters of the simulation environment

Return type

List[Node]

Returns

list of new nodes of time step t

sample(current_min_position, current_max_position, current_min_velocity, current_max_velocity)[source]¶

Sampling of desired position/velocity (difference)

Parameters

  • current_min_position (float) – current minimum position of all rrt-nodes from time step t-1 [m]

  • current_max_position (float) – current maximum position of all rrt-nodes from time step t-1 [m]

  • current_min_velocity (float) – current minimum velocity of all rrt-nodes from time step t-1 [m/s]

  • current_max_velocity (float) – current maximum velocity of all rrt-nodes from time step t-1 [m/s]

Return type

Tuple[float, float]

Returns

Sampled x-position (difference) [m] and velocity (difference) [m/s]

property sampling_range¶
Return type

List[float]

Return type

SamplingStrategy
